content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 units of iron ore, and my updated inventory now contains:
# - 5 stone
# - 10 iron ore
# - 1 iron plate
# - 5 iron gear wheels

# Now that I have iron ore again, I can proceed to insert it into the newly placed stone furnace along with some coal to start the smelting process.

# I will insert the coal and iron ore into the new furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, new_furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert coal for fuel
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, new_furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert iron ore for smelting

# Let’s check the status of the new furnace to ensure it’s functioning properly.
print(f"New Furnace status after setup: {inspect_inventory(new_furnace)}")  # Check the contents of the new furnace
print(f"Updated Inventory after adding resources: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Verify the inventory after adding resources
